      @POST("bus/create") retrofit2.Call<BaseResponse<Bus>> addBus(@Query("accountId") int accountId, @Query("name") String name, @Query("capacity") int capacity, @Query("facilities") List<Facility> facilities, @Query("busType") BusType busType, @Query("price") int price, @Query("stationDepartureId") int stationDepartureId, @Query("stationArrivalId") int stationArrivalId)

      busType - the bus type
      price - the price
      stationDepartureId - the station departure id
      stationArrivalId - the station arrival id

      the call
